input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Unobserved confounders has a direct effect on drug taken and cholesterol level. Treatment assignment has a direct effect on drug taken. Drug taken has a direct effect on cholesterol level. Unobserved confounders is unobserved. Method 1: We look directly at how drug taken correlates with cholesterol level in general. Method 2: We look at this correlation case by case according to unobserved confounders. To understand how drug taken affects cholesterol level, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
